creator: ryo_sode@filemaker.com
text:
For any of the text input fields, we can use ${<variable_name>} expression to use the global 
variable defined for each test plan. However, for anything else such as checkbox parameters, this 
is impossible unless you open .jmx file in a text editor and batch edit the entries.

This feature would be very useful. For example, I might want to turn on/off Keep-Alive feature.
